name: This Side Up (itch)
description:
Hi everyone,
welcome to "This Side Up". In this game you easily assemble a bird house with the help of your friends. Work together grabbing tools, wood and other such things to build your dream object. This game was made by Umut Akkaya Jihwoan Ahn, Yaroslav Taben, Gabriel Barbosa Nunes, Roman Polyanovsky and Rocco Commisso.

Getting Started:

First player enters their name and selects New Game. A game code will be shown in the top left corner. Give the code to your crew, they should select Join Game and enter it to join your lobby.

- Enjoy
